name: Real Sound: Kaze no Regret
description: Real Sound: Kaze no Regret (リアルサウンド ～風のリグレット～) is an adventure audio game developed by WARP, Inc. and published by Sega. The game was first released for the Saturn in July 1997, and later for the Dreamcast in March 1999. Real Sound was intended to provide equal access to players with sight and to blind players. The literal meaning of the title is Regret of the wind.
